code: @Test public void replaceWithUniqueDatabase() {     this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(ExistingDataSourceConfiguration.class).run((context) -> {         DataSource datasource = context.getBean(DataSource.class).         JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate = new JdbcTemplate(datasource).         jdbcTemplate.execute("create table example (id int, name varchar).").         this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(ExistingDataSourceConfiguration.class).run((secondContext) -> {             DataSource anotherDatasource = secondContext.getBean(DataSource.class).             JdbcTemplate anotherJdbcTemplate = new JdbcTemplate(anotherDatasource).             anotherJdbcTemplate.execute("create table example (id int, name varchar).").         }).     }). }
